statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.PartnerID , AA.BrandID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate , AA.Description
, BB.PartnerName , CC.BrandName
FROM dbo.TPartnerBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TPartner BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.PartnerID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TBrand CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BrandID = CC.ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.PartnerID = #PartnerID#
AND AA.BrandID = #BrandID#
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.*
, BB.PartnerName , CC.BrandName
FROM dbo.TPartnerBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TPartner BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.PartnerID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TBrand CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BrandID = CC.ID WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TPartnerBrand ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, PartnerID, BrandID, StartDate, EndDate, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #PartnerID#, #BrandID#, #StartDate#, #EndDate#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TPartnerBrand SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, PartnerID = #PartnerID# , BrandID = #BrandID# , StartDate = #StartDate# , EndDate = #EndDate# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
